General.Name: Petrokent Turizm AS
General.Description: Petrokent Turizm A.S. engages in the operation of resorts in Turkey. Its facilities include VONRESORT golden beach and VONRESORT Abant resorts. The company was incorporated in 1977 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.
General.Address: Barbaros District Billur Street No: 1, Ankara, Turkey
